item.title: PostgreSQL beginner guide - connecting, remote access, psql CLI and troubleshooting connection
item.description: Configure remote access - listen address By default after instalation and creting database cluster PostgreSQL will listner only on localhost. No remote access will be allowed. PostgreSQL installation on Linux - with database creation [postgres@postgres-lab ~]$ netstat -lptnu | grep post (Not all processes could be identified, non-owned process info will not be shown, you would have to be root to see it all.) tcp 0 0 127.0.0.1:5432 0.
